Flag file to flag when eke.review is being run as part of a GenericSetup
import step.

copyright laws and applicable international treaties and/or conventions.  The
United States Government may have prior rights to use some or all of the flag
file as determined under applicable contracts and license agreements with
Caltech/JPL.

This flag file was carefully and painstakingly developed at the Jet Propulsion
Laboratory, an operating division of the California Institute of Technology
and is not available for use by any person, organization, or other entity
without prior, specific written permission.
